name: Galactic Blasters Photo - Confined Emotions
description:
Galactic Blasters Photo - Confined Emotions is the 3.3rd Galactic Blasters game.

It is a photography space shooter game that takes place in the year 2044, when a photographer is asked by the H.D.E. to take photos of a recently discovered abandoned alien spacecraft, but is it truly abandoned?

Please note that the screenshots seen here are from an earlier development version of the game.

[Rating - RGAR 1] [Game - vBHGJ]
